title: Getting Cursed Dual Katana in Blox Fruits: Game Guide

steps.title: Have at least 350 mastery in Tushita and Yama.
steps.content: Have at least 350 mastery in Tushita and Yama. You can increase their mastery by using them to fight enemies.

steps.title: Go to the Mansion at Floating Turtle.
steps.content: Go to the Mansion at Floating Turtle. It's in the Third Sea.

steps.title: Speak with the Crypt Master.
steps.content: Speak with the Crypt Master. Instead of heading inside the Mansion, go to the back. You'll find the Crypt Master there.

steps.title: Complete the scroll trials.
steps.content: Complete the scroll trials. Each scroll is titled "Tushita" or "Yama," so use the associated weapon to complete the trials. There are 3 trials to each scroll: Tushita Scroll: Read this scroll and you'll need to complete 3 trials with Tushita equipped: Dock Legend: Talk to 3 boat dealers on 3 different islands. Make sure you have Tushita equipped, sail around, and talk to the NPCs. Sense of Duty: Complete a group event, a Pirate Raid. Soulless: Defeat the Cake Queen. She's a level 2,175 boss found in Ice Cream Land in the Sea of Treats. You need to beat her before the song ends. If not, you'll be transported to a different location where you'll need to light some torches, kill enemies, and start the fight with the Cake Queen again. [1] X Research source Yama Scroll: Read this scroll and you'll need to complete three trials with Yama in hand: Pain and Suffering: Have an enemy attack you until you die. The Haze of Misery: Find an NPC with purple marks and kill them. You'll find these NPCs in the Third Sea. Fear the Reaper: Get Haunted Essence from the Soul Reaper in Haunted Castle Island and let the NPC kill you. You'll be transported to Hell, where you must kill all the enemies you see. Also, light 3 torches. After completing the trials, you'll have six Alucard Shards.

steps.title: Summon the Cursed Skeleton Boss.
steps.content: Summon the Cursed Skeleton Boss. Place the six Alucard Shards on a pedestal at the front of the Mansion to summon the Cursed Skeleton Boss.

steps.title: Use Tushita or Yama to defeat the boss.
steps.content: Use Tushita or Yama to defeat the boss. Once you defeat the boss, you'll loot Cursed Dual Katana. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Revolving Ravager/Z.
steps.content: Revolving Ravager/ Z . 175 mastery. You spin around, forming a red and black tornado that stuns and damages nearby enemies. After a moment, the tornado moves away from you and drags enemies away. Press and hold the Z key to keep the tornado in place and deal extra damage.

steps.title: Slayer of Goliath/X.
steps.content: Slayer of Goliath/ X . 375 mastery. Backflip before crossing your swords and dashing at an enemy, slicing and causing high damage. When you come into contact with the enemy, there's a small explosion that deals damage to your enemy and knocks them back. Hold X to increase your damage.
